籤詩版本二:
The sky is filled with scorching flames
A lotus grows in the flames
It will succeed in the end without any harm
Still growing leaves and roots
詩意: This hexagram is like a lotus growing in the fire. Everything seems dangerous but is not dangerous.
解曰: Although in danger. No harm to his body. To make a living. All meet noble people.
籤詩故事一:
◇Fire Gourd Valley
During the Three Kingdoms period, Liu Bei and Zhou Yu jointly attacked Cao Cao. Kong Ming set up a seven-star platform to worship the east wind and helped Zhou Yu burn Red Cliff. Cao Cao's army was burned and fled in panic. Cao Cao also fled with a defeated army.
The generals of Kongming faction ambushed everywhere.
Cao Cao went to the mouth of Hulu Valley to rest and cook. Seeing that the terrain was dangerous and there was no ambush, he laughed.
Suddenly he heard the sound of cannon and Zhang Fei came to kill him.
Fires broke out everywhere in the valley, and Cao Cao's army struggled. Cao Cao mounted his horse and fled in panic in the fire.
Defeat and go to Huarong Road.
(Although he is in danger, he can still save his life.)
聖意:
The house is not safe.
Beware of yourself.
Seeking wealth and labor.
Trading Villain.
Marriage is hindered.
Liujia: False alarm.
Pedestrians block.
Tian silkworms are missing.


Six animals are damaged.
Looking for people in the west.
Litigation loss.
Migration. Conservatism.
Lost property South.
Diseases are provided.
Mountain tomb changed.
